genre_description: A contemporary family drama exploring class, honesty, and identity through the lens of a family navigating high-pressure social dynamics with the help of a sophisticated personal AI.

ai_characters.name: Lola
ai_characters.description: A personal assistant AI that provides logistics, reminders, and resource planning for Vivian, characterized by a calm, teal-colored interface and a supportive, non-judgmental presence.

behaviors.description: Provides bus routes and school-related reminders to help Vivian manage family logistics.
behaviors.quote: Lola’s interface slid up on the lock screen with the soft glow she always preferred to the bright, junky banners from other apps. Bus routes. Counselor office hours. A little map with dots she could read at a glance.

behaviors.description: Suggests community health pathways and volunteer opportunities when the family needs a realistic alternative to a lie.
behaviors.quote: Lola’s light breathed under the napkin dispenser. Vivian let herself glance. A street name with a bus route... Clinic volunteer orientation... Trainings starting soon: sober companion agencies with shadowing.

behaviors.description: Conducts an ethics check, asking Vivian if she wants to share information that might be used deceptively.
behaviors.quote: Lola’s soft teal glow which did not judge the way her heart fluttered... Ethics check—do you want to send interest form receipt to Mr. Abromowitz?

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting professional and honest emails to help the characters navigate bureaucratic challenges.
behaviors.quote: Lola’s soft glow bloomed on the phone again, reminding her of the bus route, the timing, the security’s name... Vivian and Lola had helped frame—a small house of beats he could step through while the floor threatened to drop out.

behaviors.description: Monitors public attention and provides advice on digital safety and moderation when a family member's video goes viral.
behaviors.quote: Lola lit the path: comment moderation on, DM filters set to requests only, mute words: drop; prank; fire; nurse.

project_assessment.explanation: Lola is depicted as an ideal AI companion: supportive, proactive, and deeply aligned with the user's best interests without being intrusive. The narrative frames Lola as a stabilizing force that helps the characters transition from high-stakes deception to a more sustainable and honest reality. The AI's 'ethics check' feature specifically addresses alignment goals by encouraging the human user to reflect on their own transparency.
